entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Mont-Joli
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:04 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -5.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mont-Joli Airport 12:00 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -5.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -8.0°C
Wind: NE 28 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Increasing cloudiness. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow or freezing rain. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets beginning in the morning then changing to freezing rain in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow or freezing rain. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to snow late in the evening. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 late in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023
